summary: The module defines AWS CDK stacks that set up an API Gateway stage with deployment, logging, throttling, and environment configuration, as well as a complete serverless API comprising Lambda functions, API Gateway endpoints, and supporting data stores, ready for deployment.
business_intent: Automate the provisioning of a monitored and traceable serverless API infrastructure, enabling rapid and repeatable deployment of API Gateway resources with Xâ€‘Ray tracing and operational controls.
